entry.title: Putin Says Ukraine Peace Talks Hit 'Dead End,' Vows to Continue Fight
entry.content: The Russian leader cited “fake” war-crimes allegations and stated the goal of aiding people in Donbas, as Ukraine probed an alleged Russian chemical-weapons attack in Mariupol.

entry.title: Ukrainians Use Drones, Facial-Recognition Software as They Probe Alleged War Crimes
entry.content: Authorities are embarking on a wide-ranging probe of alleged war crimes with the aim of building cases strong enough to persuade an international court to hold the Kremlin and its soldiers responsible.
